shapecode_0_border_g=0.000
shapecode_0_border_b=0.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=a=0.1+(0.1*mid);	
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=20
shapecode_1_additive=1
shapecode_1_thickOutline=1
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1

shapecode_1_rad=3.00000
shapecode_1_ang=0.27000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=0.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=0.039
shapecode_1_r2=0.200
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=rad=bass*2;
shape_1_per_frame2=r=min(sin(1-time),1);
shape_1_per_frame3=g=1-min(sin((1-r)*3.14),1);
shape_1_per_frame4=b=min(abs(sin(2-g-r)),1);
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=20
shapecode_2_additive=1
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.100
shapecode_2_y=0.900
shapecode_2_rad=3.00000
shapecode_2_ang=0.27000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=0.100
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=0.040
shapecode_2_r2=0.100
shapecode_2_g2=0.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=rad=treb*2;
shape_2_per_frame2=r=min(abs(sin(time-0.6)),1);
shape_2_per_frame3=g=1-min(abs(sin((1-r)*3.14)),1);
shape_2_per_frame4=b=min(abs(sin(1-g)),1);
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=20
shapecode_3_additive=1
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.900
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=1.58000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=0.800
shapecode_3_g=0.800
shapecode_3_b=0.800
shapecode_3_a=0.800
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=0.000
shapecode_3_border_g=0.000
shapecode_3_border_b=0.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=xp=0.53129;
shape_3_per_frame2=yp=0.25;
shape_3_per_frame3=xcorr=yp*0.18+0.3;
shape_3_per_frame4=ang=time*150;
shape_3_per_frame5=xq=xp*sin(ang);
shape_3_per_frame6=yq=yp;
shape_3_per_frame7=zq=xp*cos(ang);
shape_3_per_frame8=xp=xq*sin(ang)+zq*cos(ang);
shape_3_per_frame9=yp=yq;
shape_3_per_frame10=zp=xq*cos(ang)-zq*sin(ang);
shape_3_per_frame11=xq=xp;
shape_3_per_frame12=yq=yp*sin(ang)+zp*cos(ang);
shape_3_per_frame13=zq=yp*cos(ang)-zp*sin(ang);
shape_3_per_frame14=zq=zq+3.14;
shape_3_per_frame15=xs=xq/zq;
shape_3_per_frame16=ys=yq/zq;
shape_3_per_frame17=x=min(abs(xs*5-xcorr),1);
shape_3_per_frame18=y=min(abs(ys*1.3+0.5),1);
shape_3_per_frame19=r=min(abs(sin(time)),1);
shape_3_per_frame20=g=1-min(abs(sin((1-r)*3.14)),1);
shape_3_per_frame21=b=min(abs(sin(1-g)),1);
shape_3_per_frame22=rad=(bass+mid+treb+2)*0.05;
per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq31=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq31);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q31=mq31;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_19=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_20=q11=.4+sin(atime*.006        )*.4;
per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;
per_frame_23=monitor=q13;
per_frame_24=q4=sin(atime*.03);
per_frame_25=q5=cos(atime*.030383824);
per_frame_26=q6=tan(atime*.029384834);
per_frame_27=
per_frame_28=warp=0;
per_frame_29=wave_a = 0;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=//begin beat code
per_frame_32=volume = 0.3*(bass+mid);
per_frame_33=beatrate = equal(beatrate,0) + (1-equal(beatrate,0))*(below(volume,0.01) + (1-below(volume,0.01))*beatrate);
per_frame_34=lastbeat = lastbeat + equal(lastbeat,0)*time;
per_frame_35=meanbass_att = 0.05*(meanbass_att*19 + bass_att);
per_frame_36=peakbass_att = max(bass_att,peakbass_att);
per_frame_37=beat = above(volume,0.8)*below(peakbass_att - bass_att, 0.05*peakbass_att)*above(time - lastbeat, 0.1 + 0.5*(beatrate - 0.1));
per_frame_38=beatrate = max(if(beat,if(below(time-lastbeat,2*beatrate),0.1*(beatrate*9 + time - lastbeat),beatrate),beatrate),0.1);
per_frame_39=//Adjust responsiveness: To increase responsiveness, set the "0.96 and "0.996" on the next line to slightly lower values. Higher values decrease responsiveness.
per_frame_40=peakbass_att = beat*bass_att + (1-beat)*peakbass_att*(above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate)*0.96 + (1-above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate))*0.996);
per_frame_41=lastbeat = beat*time + (1-beat)*lastbeat;
per_frame_42=peakbass_att = max(peakbass_att,1.1*meanbass_att);
per_frame_43=//end beat code
per_frame_44=
per_frame_45=xamptarg = if(equal(frame%15,0),min(0.25*volume*bass_att,0.5),xamptarg);
per_frame_46=xamp = xamp + 0.5*(xamptarg-xamp);
per_frame_47=xdir = if(above(abs(xpos),xamp),-sign(xpos),if(below(abs(xspeed),0.1),2*above(xpos,0)-1,xdir));
per_frame_48=xspeed = xspeed + xdir*xamp - xpos - xspeed*0.055*below(abs(xpos),xamp);
per_frame_49=xpos = xpos + 0.001*xspeed;
per_frame_50=yamptarg = if(equal(frame%15,0),min(0.15*volume*treb_att,0.5),yamptarg);
per_frame_51=yamp = yamp + 0.5*(yamptarg-yamp);
per_frame_52=ydir = if(above(abs(ypos),yamp),-sign(ypos),if(below(abs(yspeed),0.1),2*above(ypos,0)-1,ydir));
per_frame_53=yspeed = yspeed + ydir*yamp - ypos - yspeed*0.055*below(abs(ypos),yamp);
per_frame_54=ypos = ypos + 0.001*yspeed;
per_frame_55=q1 = beat;
per_frame_56=q2 = xpos;
per_frame_57=q3 = ypos;
per_frame_58=q4 = time*0.5;
per_frame_59=
per_frame_60=q5 = 0.25*(sin(time*0.15)+sin(time*0.85))+0.5;
per_frame_61=
per_frame_62=monitor = q5;
per_frame_63=
per_frame_64=decay=1;
per_pixel_1=zoom=.9999;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.00+0.5 ).x;
warp_4=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.98+0.5 ).y;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.95+0.5 ).z;
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`    // .x = fastest layer, .z = slowest
warp_18=`    // slowly shift stuff toward the front, over time:
warp_19=`    ret += float3(-ret.x,ret.x-ret.y,ret.y-ret.z)*0.03, (bass_att-1)*0.1;
warp_20=`     
warp_21=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_22=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_23=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*3;
warp_24=`
warp_25=`    // darken over time
warp_26=`    //ret -= 0.003;
warp_27=`    //ret *= 0.99;
warp_28=`    //ret *= 0.97*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_5=`}
